titleStmt.title: His Maiesties speech to the gentlemen of Yorkshire, on Thursday the fourth of August 1642 also a list of the names of the counsell of war now resident with His Maiesty.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Tho. Banks and Will. Ley,
